website_summaries.verdict: Easy to carry from car to office or hotel room, making this a go-to travel item.
pros: Steady essential oil diffusion for six hours with a half-cup of water
Relaxing light mode that can be switched off if desired
Rubber feet provide good grip on flat surfaces
cons: Reservoir can leak if not kept stable and upright
Too wide for most car cupholders

customer_reviews.title: I love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. I am somewhat new to the oil world but I needed something at my desk to help put a little moisture in the air and having it smell nice is a bonus. This unit runs all day. I put water in it about 0730 and I am dumping water out 9 hours later. I can see the constant "smoke" so I know it is working. I love that it uses a usb (as well as regular plug) because I have few outlets and mostly use my laptop at work. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Love my travel diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little gem for a business trip, as I didn't want to take my normal full sized version. It was a life saver and I couldn't be happier with it. The mist lasted much longer than expected each night and with an even flow. Its the perfect size for traveling and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Blueyes1129

customer_reviews.title: This little diffuser works overtime.
customer_reviews.text: This diffuser was recommended by a coworker who purchased it to use on business trips and in the office. I purchased it to use in my small office space and use it almost every workday. I'm absolutely thrilled with the performance of this diffuser. It's completely silent and diffuses for about 6 hours with about 1/2 cup of water. I really didn't think I would use the light mode, but it is one of my favorite features. This diffuser (with my favorite oil blends) offers a completely relaxing/stress reducing experience. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jpt816

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my office
customer_reviews.text: This little diffuser works great and covers a surprisingly large area. I took off one star because the wall plug didn't work. I just used the USB connector to my computer instead. It will also plug into your stand USB wall plug so not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend... I use this at work and at home, travels well. Sometimes if I fill it too high it won’t work so I’ll have to dump some water out - definitely make sure not to fill over the line marked on the inside. Comes with a helpful little measuring cup (see photo). Also - be careful when cleaning it because I’ve gotten water all over it and it hasn’t worked for about a day - but then once all the water dries out, it works again. Probably more user error than the products fault! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Good size, not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I travel often for work, 1-2 times per month, 2-5 days per trip Wanted something to help dry sinuses. This worked for about 5 trips then stopped vaporizing. It would run but not vapor and would leak all over the table. Tried cleaning per instructions but didn’t solve. Good size, but not a long life.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie-801

customer_reviews.title: Little but effective
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size to just have a little aromatherapy at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: InishPony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small office!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size for my office It is a great diffuser with lots of mist.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Knox

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely small and for about 10.00 more you can purchase a large size. Water holder only held about 1/3 cup of water.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this little humidifier! I've had it over a year, and I use it often, and it works well! Great value!
customer_reviews.author: T.  Luke

customer_reviews.title: Every time I come over I see that she's using it and makes her apartment smell great.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my friend and she loves it. Every time I come over I see that she's using it and makes her apartment smell great.
customer_reviews.author: jose colmenero Jr

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great for travel IF you don't overfill it.
customer_reviews.author: CGA

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful Resting Away From Home
customer_reviews.text: The night light on diffuser helps to create a calm atmosphere for travel.
customer_reviews.author: lovetta j spencer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I travel a lot and wanted to be able to diffuse my essential oils in my hotel rooms etc. This worked great for about a month, then it just stopped working. The mist would get trapped in the machine and not come out. I cleaned it and tried it several times and it still never worked again. Very frustrating and a waste of money. I would not recommend purchasing this.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Small in size and performance
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this diffuser. I travel quite a bit and depend on my essential oils when traveling. I needed a smaller diffuser that would easily fit in my suitcase. This one works, but the output is minimal. My other diffuser would have the entire room smelling wonderful in minutes. After four hours you can barely smell the oils. The design is not optimal either. In my picture the red circle is around a well of water that will never diffuse because it is so low. And where the arrow is pointing a bubble has started forming at the center spout that stops the diffusing mist. The only thing I like about this is the size.
customer_reviews.author: Susannah

customer_reviews.title: Diffuse Away!
customer_reviews.text: This is great little diffuser! I bought this one for work because of the USB option and it’s perfect next to my computer - plus the look of it is very contemporary which is a plus! Not bulky. It releases the perfect amount of mist for the office. It would make for a nice gift too! Buy one you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Lmp33

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this diffuser for 2 1/2 years and it is still working just as well as the day I bought it. I love this diffuser and it's the perfect size for a bedroom. I really like that the light can be turned off as well. If you pick it up to move it while it's full it will probably spill, but that's not surprising for a diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brad Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great for small work spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser. I have my regular sized ones I have for home but this one is perfect for work. I work in a call center so it can get a little stressful at times. I love being able to just plug this in the USB on my computer. The Mini is great because I don't have to worry about the smell being too strong, so no one complains about it. If anything, I get compliments on how great it smells! Only con is how much water is left in the bottom after it switches off. It doesn't run dry.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great diffuser poor humidifier
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly as a diffuser, by no means will this tiny device do anything to humidify any type of space larger that a small closet.. if you want a portable humidifier for when you travel. Look elsewhere.. don’t get me wrong, this device works great for diffusing essential oils but not for adding humidity to the air
customer_reviews.author: M. Miri

customer_reviews.title: Durable little workhorse. Perfect for business traveler.
customer_reviews.text: Travel for business often ... use this in hotel room every night. A little lavender oil and I sleep like a baby. Easy to use and durable. 1 year and counting. FYI ... it USB compatible and it works off of a batter pack during power outages or camping.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A Porter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful mini diffuser, BUT beeping noises too loud for open office
customer_reviews.text: Bought this diffuser for my cubicle at work. Love the modern design and two mist settings that were perfect in keeping smell only at my area. However, ended up not using it since the beeping noises when switching modes and turning on/off were too loud for the office every time I wanted to use the diffuser. Wish they made a silent mode then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diffuser! It has traveled with me more than once in my suitcase that had flown with me. Works great, perfect size, and the light is the right brightness to not be irritating while trying to sleep. I bought this based on other reviews and am not disappointed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sbuchanich

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and still it’s going strong in my bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be wiped down a lot but it’s a great little diffuser!
customer_reviews.author: Cadimom

customer_reviews.title: Small yet powerful
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my cubicle at work. It doesn't take up much space and I can use either my USB or plug to operate it. It's also powerful enough to disperse the essential oils throughout my cube but not the entire room just in case someone else doesn't like it. I'm considering getting another one for one of my rooms at home.
customer_reviews.author: Tianna

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well at all
customer_reviews.text: Directions are about 1 mm tall and can't be read without blowing up. They don't really explain WHY the thing won't work. It changes color but doesn't diffuse.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Compact and really nice
customer_reviews.text: Love the small size and changing colors & mist settings. It seems to go forever also. Just got and will be taking on vacation. My 15 year old son loves it also. Just got so let's hope it lasts (bought 2).
customer_reviews.author: Sharondea

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Works well but shuts off too soon. Great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: K. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This little diffuser is the perfect size for me to put on my desk at work. It's simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: sara narrow-lapoint

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is the perfect size for my office.
customer_reviews.author: E. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Nice for traveling, compact and cleans easy. Set up is a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Kelm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my desk- make sure you clean regularly so the mist continues to come out strong.
customer_reviews.author: alj87

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my desk, I don't have much room and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: lwtexas

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 use
customer_reviews.text: Used this once and it doesn't work anymore. It sounds like it's working and it spits water everywhere if you open the lid while running, but no vapor comes out. Bummed, I wanted to travel with this but it's just trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a larger (300 ml) diffuser, and wanted a smaller one for travel or use in the kitchen. I received a discount for purchasing this model, so I gave it a try. It can be plugged into a USB port or into the wall outlet, and is small for travel. The lid lifts off easily, and has low and high speeds, as well as a few light colors that are optional. It puts out a large volume of steam, and was very fragrant in about a 350 sq foot room. A good buy for a second one to have on hand. My kids want to use it in their room, so they may be getting one as well.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for bathrooms, smaller bedrooms, campers, or entryways! I love the touch buttons. As I've recently started filling my home with diffusers these are absolutely perfect for us! Great for gift giving too! *this was a review product I ordered....Sooooo glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Keri Rydin

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pushing steam through top
customer_reviews.text: I've had this diffuser for about 6 months and it was a dream! Then, last week, it stopped forcing the steam through the top. I cleaned it thoroughly, but it's still not releasing the steam. It's making steam but won't push through the top. So sad!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great for office
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing :) I am so happy with this product! It fills the whole flat with the scent, it's very quiet and flashes all those lovely colours, adding to the atmosphere. Product arrived very well and safely packed and in good shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this humidifier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great oil diffuser with air humidifier, nice lights you can choose different color by pressing the button or the same color that is brighter. Smell is not very strongly diffused but iI like it because it is not overwhelming. Tried it in my bedroom it works well.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: satisfied with the diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with the product. very beautiful and effective. great quality finish and comes with a small canister to put the water in the container and with adapter to plug directly into the socket.
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Travelling essential
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work (normally) and have very dry skin. You can plug this into an outlet or a USB charger. I use it in hotels to increase the humidity next to the bed. I also put essential oils in it for relaxation. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully getting a second one
customer_reviews.text: Very basic but solid construction (less parts = less thing to potentially malfunction). I've been using it attached to my PC at work nearly everyday (check with you officemates for odor sensitivities first!). TIP: Use clean distilled or filtered water to prevent clogging. Even 1 or 2 drops is enough for slight fragrance. I plan on purchasing a 2nd one for my office at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jediprincess

customer_reviews.title: Great little diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I love how small and versitile this is. I can take it with me wherever I take a USB charger. This works well at the office, hotel, my child's room, a class room or anywhere else that I can think of. It is quiet and easy to operate. So far I am pleased with this purchase. I love to use essential oils for everything as I believe it is a more natural way to heal so will be using this little diffuser quite frequently. Yay! I did receive a small discount for in return for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Cali_mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product.use it everyday!!! The functionality of this thing, I must say it's great. the lid was easy to lift and cleaning the inside was a cinch - like the lid to a mug it's completely open. No drips or leaking issues. Fragrance was very strong with just a drop or two. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: MFEEL Mini USB Essential Oil Diffuser, 100ml Portable Humidifier, Travel-Size Air Humidifier Ultrasonic Cool Mist Aroma Humidifier Air Purifier for Bedroom Baby Room Home Office Car
feature_bullets: New version mini portable humidifier, cool mist humidifier, desk humidifier, ultrasonic humidifier, travel-size humidifier with super soft and smooth mist.
Great gift choice for family and friends. Mini portable size makes it quite convenient for home, baby room, office, spa, yoga and car.
Multiple power supply, could be charged by AC adaptor, USB, mobile phone charger, power bank or car USB power supply, for different using demands.
Easy to use, 2 touch press button to control light and mist; water-proof design, waterless auto shut-off function; 2 light modes and 2 mist modes as well as 7 changing colors.
MIST INTENSITY: Choose to operate the diffuser at high mist intensity for 4 hours, or at low mist intensity for 8 hours. Features safe shut-off when the water tank runs low.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars89 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
